traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Flyby
entries: The devil doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Limited Spines
entries: The devil has twelve tail spines. Used spines regrow by the time the devil finishes a long rest.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its fork or two with its tail spines.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (2d4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fork
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d6 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spine
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 20/80 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage.
